participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: An introverted and sensitive individual with a deep-seated fear of clowns, yet finds solace in gardening and working with her hands.
participant_1.background: i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: A laid-back and humorous guy who enjoys simple pleasures in life, like spending time with his cat and listening to classic rock.
participant_2.background: i have never been out of ohio. i work for our local supermarket. my favorite band is the who. i've a cat named spook. my favorite food is pizza with black olives.

content.text: Seriously, Father, I feel 20 years younger.
